verses.text: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* choirmaster. \w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*. \w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Alamoth|strong="H5961"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*. God \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* refuge \w and|strong="H1121"\w* strength, \w an|strong="H5921"\w* ever-present help \w in|strong="H5921"\w* times \w of|strong="H1121"\w* trouble.

Therefore \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5797"\w* not fear, though \w the|strong="H4672"\w* earth \w is|strong="H6869"\w* transformed \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* mountains \w are|strong="H6869"\w* toppled \w into|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* depths \w of|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* seas,

though \w their|strong="H5921"\w* waters roar \w and|strong="H2022"\w* foam \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* quake \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* surge. Selah

\w There|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* river whose streams delight \w the|strong="H2022"\w* city \w of|strong="H2022"\w* God, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* holy place where \w the|strong="H2022"\w* Most High dwells.

God \w is|strong="H5892"\w* within her; \w she|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* moved. God \w will|strong="H5892"\w* help her when morning dawns.
Nations rage, kingdoms \w crumble|strong="H4131"\w*; \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth melts \w when|strong="H6437"\w* \w He|strong="H1242"\w* lifts \w His|strong="H7130"\w* voice.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Hosts \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H6963"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* fortress. Selah

\w Come|strong="H6635"\w*, see \w the|strong="H3068"\w* works \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* brings devastation upon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H7760"\w* wars \w to|strong="H3212"\w* cease throughout \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* breaks \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bow \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shatters \w the|strong="H3068"\w* spear; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* burns \w the|strong="H3068"\w* shields \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire.

“\w Be|strong="H7665"\w* \w still|strong="H7673"\w* \w and|strong="H7198"\w* know \w that|strong="H4421"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* am God; \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* exalted \w among|strong="H7097"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* nations, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* exalted \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Hosts \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* fortress. Selah
